name: Sech
description: '''Carlos Isaías Morales Williams Boiro''' (born December 3, 1993), better known as '''Sech''', is a Panamanian singer, songwriter and record producer. He is from the [[Río Abajo]] township of [[Panama City]] and is best known for his single "[[Otro Trago]]", which was nominated for Best Urban Song and Best Urban Fusion/Performance at the [[20th Annual Latin Grammy Awards|2019 Latin Grammy Awards]]. He has collaborated with numerous Latin artists including [[Maluma (singer)|Maluma]], [[Anitta (singer)|Anitta]], [[Nicky Jam]], [[Daddy Yankee]], and [[Bad Bunny]]. He released his debut studio album ''[[Sueños (Sech album)|Sueños]]'' in April 2019 and his second album ''[[1 of 1 (Sech album)|1 of 1]]''  was released on May 21, 2020.
